pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sdis.kerby.cli

Class KerbyClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sdis.kerby.cli.KerbyClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KerbyPortType

    public class KerbyClient
extends Object
implements KerbyPortType
    Client port wrapper. Adds easier end point address configuration to the Port generated by wsimport.
